website_summaries.verdict: These cotton-blend trouser socks are suitable for warm-weather wear. Some may find them binding, however.
pros: Durable, thanks to the cotton and nylon blend material and reinforced toes
Fit falls just below the knee for most wearers
cons: Top band may be too tight for some
Although the material has nice quality, it feels somewhat thin

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The band at the top of one of the socks came apart the second time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelalexandra

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay up
customer_reviews.text: I read these were the best trouser socks and the they stay up well but lo and behold, they fall down. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Nice trouser sock for the office. Thinker than knee highs but thinner than socks.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Slouchy
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the material and the pattern but the length is too short and the band is not firm enough which makes them slouch.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Balderas

customer_reviews.title: Best Trouser Socks Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love me some Womens Gold Toe trouser socks. Reinforced toes never wear out. Great fit and don’t slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Oxendine

customer_reviews.title: Good fit; not a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, stay up but not too tight; not a bargain but not over my budget if they will last in the washer & dryer without pilling
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Tight band
customer_reviews.text: I have slim, average sized calves. The bands on these are socks are quite tight. I had to slide them down 3/4 to be comfortable. I wouldn't buy these again but I will still wear them. The rest of the sock is pretty much unremarkable, neither cheap nor expensive feeling/looking. Average.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin trouser socks
customer_reviews.text: These look nice, but are very thin. I am concerned about how long they will hold up. Still, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara/Frank

customer_reviews.title: Gold Toe Women's Pattern Trouser 3 Pack
customer_reviews.text: Pattern knit into socks very nice, but the top band -- as good with trouser socks -- is tight and uncomfortable. Sad, because the sock part fits perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Whisper

customer_reviews.title: gold toe?
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these socks are Gold Toe. Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

product_meta.title: Gold Toe Women's Pattern Trouser 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Lightweight knee high length trouser sock in 3 different patterns. 3 pr pack nylon with spandex
feature_bullets: For best results launder inside out. machine wash warm with like colors. only non chlorine bleach when needed. tumble dry low.
